ComicInfo.Summary:
Adventure The Fifth: The Endless Nightmare of Leonard Samson Part Two: Doc's crew manage to free themselves from their traps. With their aid, and help from Dr. Leonard Samson Earth-617, Doc stops Nightmare's invasion.
Nightmare Hour: Doc Samson tries to help a little girl overcome her nightmares, but its the Living Totem who succeeds on the spirit plane.
ComicInfo.Tags: Doc Samson,Jack Holyoak,Nightmare,Energumen,Las Vegas,New York City,Tina Punnett,Living Totem
ComicInfo.Title: Adventure The Fifth: The Endless Nightmare of Leonard Samson Part Two; Nightmare Hour
